document.full_text: the u.s. bureau of ocean energy management said on sunday it had not struck a deal with bp to allow the oil company to resume deepwater drilling in the gulf of mexico, refuting a press report.
document.title: u.s. drilling agency says no deal with bp
lines_and_colors: the u.s. bureau of ocean energy management said on sunday it had not struck a deal with bp to allow the oil company to resume deepwater drilling in the gulf of mexico, refuting a press report.
